snippet.title: Red Alert: A Path Beyond - Gamma Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
2009 RA:APB Gamma trailer. Features in-game footage representative of recent public and internal builds with the HUD disabled. Inspired by and modeled after the original Red Alert teaser trailer, and original Red Alert game intro video.

This is fitting as Red Alert: A Path Beyond is inspired by and modeled after the original Command & Conquer: Red Alert! You can find more information on this free, standalone indie game at www.apathbeyond.com including forums and downloads.

Trailer intended as promotional material for ModDB Mod of the Year 2009 competition, as RA:APB has made it into the Top 100 as an Indie Game at http://www.moddb.com/events/2009-mod-of-the-year-awards/top100
